resources.string: Age range preference allow us to suggest matches accordingly. Some Matches may fall outSide the specified range
We strongly recommend to keep the notification ON.You don\'t want to miss a chat notification from your match
Here to only help friends? Just hide your profile and be a match-maker
Please select your language of choice. The language change will take place once you go to the home screen
Never miss an update by whitelisting our app from battery optimization
